DOC.brief_title: A Study Ovarian , Non-Small Cell Lung , Prostate , Colorectal , Gastroesophageal Cancers , Squamous Cell Carcinoma Head Neck
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis ovarian , nonsmall cell lung , prostate , colorectal , gastroesophageal cancer , squamous cell cancer head neck Have measurable disease define Response Evaluation Criteria Solid Tumors ( RECIST ) 1.1 guideline ( except prostate cancer patient ) Have Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status 0 1 Are willing follow study procedure duration study Are willing use approve contraceptive method treatment 3 month discontinuation study treatment Have serious preexist medical condition would preclude participation study Are pregnant lactate Have receive treatment within 28 day first dose LY2523355 drug receive regulatory approval indication Have symptomatic , untreated , uncontrolled central nervous system ( CNS ) metastasis Have second active primary malignancy history second malignancy require cytotoxic therapy Have QTc interval great 470 msec intraventricular conduction delay ( IVCD ) QRS great 120 msec screen electrocardiogram ( ECG ) Have active symptomatic fungal , bacterial , and/or know viral infection include active human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) viral ( A , B , C ) hepatitis Patients pneumonia , evidence obstructive pneumonitis , respiratory infection , infection source exclude
